name: familymedia-project
description: FamilyMedia Project with comprehensive backup and validation tools

scripts.pre-change: npm run backup:create && npm run validate
scripts.backup:help:
echo 'Available backup commands:
  backup:create - Create a new backup
  backup:list - List all backups
  backup:restore - Restore a backup (interactive)
  backup:cleanup - Clean up old backups (interactive)
  backup:cleanup:policy - Apply cleanup policy
  backup:cleanup:dry - Preview cleanup (dry run)
  backup:stats - Show backup statistics'

author: Family Media
